nodes.text: Janner was a Human female who served as a Private in the Galactic Republic during the Cold War against the resurgent Sith Empire.

Private Janner appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Medium Armor Vendor for Republic players on Hoth. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Janner was removed from the game along with the rest of the Medium Armor Vendors. Her position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
